subject: Baseball
Discrimination
Homosexuality
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The Blue Jays suspended Yunel Escobar for three games on Tuesday for wearing eyeblack with an anti-gay slur written in Spanish during a game on Saturday in Toronto.
snippet: The Blue Jays suspended Yunel Escobar for three games on Tuesday for wearing eyeblack with an anti-gay slur written in Spanish during a game on Saturday in Toronto.
